components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays To NCell Network in Nepal

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to NCell Network in Nepal. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Console not Taking Account Upgrade After Being Completed

incident_updates.body: Our engineers have identified an issue with the upgrade flow in Console where customers still see the "Upgrade" button available after completing the upgrade of the account and are working to deploy a fix. As a workaround, customers can do a hard refresh in the browser and then the console will reflect the upgraded state. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Twilio Flex - Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Were conducting a planned maintenance in all regions between 9:00 pm and 11:59 pm Pacific Time on 03/12/2025. During this planned maintenance window, the team will be migrating data to the new cluster. There will be two cluster reboots (about 10 seconds each) during this time. Customers may experience the following during the two cluster reboots:

- Login failures for customers logging in via legacy SSO (customers with enhanced SSO are not impacted) or console 
- Customers that are already logged in may be logged out from Flex UI or webchat
- Customers using webchat may be unable initiate new sessions or see disruptions to their existing sessions (token refresh failure)

Customers should be able re-login after the impact period in case of login failure during the maintenance window.

affected_components.name: FLEX - Flex Application Platform
FLEX - Flex Admin Console
FLEX - Flex Programmable Chat

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Twilio is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 05 March 2025 at 20:00 PST until 27 March 2025 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays or failures delivering SMS and MMS to and from United States and Canada handsets via subset of long codes, short codes and toll free numbers.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

05 March 2025 at 20:00 PST until 06 March 2025 at 00:00 PST
12 March 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 13 March 2025 at 00:00 PDT
19 March 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 20 March 2025 at 00:00 PDT
26 March 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 27 March 2025 at 00:00 PDT

We are aware of the short notice. We are working to provide earlier notification where possible.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Tele2

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Europe

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 05 March 2025 at 12:00 PST until 31 March 2025 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

05 March 2025 at 12:00 PST until 05 March 2025 at 16:00 PST
10 March 2025 at 13:00 PDT until 10 March 2025 at 17:00 PDT
12 March 2025 at 13:00 PDT until 12 March 2025 at 17:00 PDT

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The SoftBank Mobile network in Japan is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 04 March 2025 at 06:00 PST until 17 March 2025 at 08:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from SoftBank Mobile Japan handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:
